name: Cinemabition (21T1)
description:
Cinemabition is a playable exhibition featuring many of the projects created by Games students during Trimester 1 2021 at SAE's Brisbane Campus.

Cinemabition Team (21T1)

  • Noran Linggod
  • Baylee Windebank

Cinemabition Team (20T2)

  • Jakob Houghton
  • Liam Sigrell
  • Reece Jones
  • Harrison Sinnamon
  • Jack Yeomans

Facilitators

  • Erika Verkaaik
  • Greg Quincey

Exhibition base + additional development

  • Iain McManus

Featured Projects

  • GAD170 - Field of Fire (Tanky Tanks)
  • GAD170 - TankZilla
  • Studio 1 - Desolately
  • Studio 1 - Duck Em
  • Studio 1 - The Slime Game
  • Studio 2 - A Dark Malfunction
  • Studio 2 - A Desert of Ghosts
  • Studio 2 - Bonsai
  • Studio 2 - Collective Energy
  • Studio 2 - Fishlastic
  • Studio 2 - FLAGS
  • Studio 2 - Hand by Hand
  • Studio 2 - In the Best of Worlds
  • Studio 2 - Kwadennial
  • Studio 2 - Rock City
  • Studio 2 - Scribble's Day Out
  • Studio 2 - The Rising Sun
  • Studio 2 - Unreciprocated
  • Studio 2 - You Can't Play
  • Studio 3 - Dog-Go
  • Studio 3 - Galactic Sweep
  • CIU330 - The Pigeon Theory
  • CIU330 - To The Theatre
